title: Epitaph
support: Marble plaque of which the upper part is missing; the rear is only roughly finished.

handNote.lettering: Regular letters, Ε and Σ lunate, Μ cursive.

date._: 2nd century CE or first half of 3rd century CE

provenanceFound._: Original discovery not recorded, probably Catania.

provenanceObserved._: Observed by Torremuzza and Kaibel in Museo Biscari, later by Korhonen in magazzino superiore, Collezione Biscari (formerly sala VII 186).

facsimile.desc: I.Sicily with the permission of the Assessorato Regionale dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana - Dipartimento dei Beni Culturali e dell’Identità Siciliana

location.address: Castello Ursino, Piazza Federico II di Svevia, 95121 Catania (CT)
